QuestData.Title: The Joy of Flight
QuestData.Description:
You be ready, $n?
Kua'fon is ready to fly. Whether or not he can is another question, but all the same I will see you two back to the roost.
Climb aboard and guide him. I can't imagine he can see very well through that skull.
Ata and I will lead the way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow Hexlord Raal and fly Kua'fon back to the roost

Objectives.Objective: Follow Hexlord Raal back to the roost
